author: acolytec3
content: Note to team, finally have a breakthrough with the browser <-> nodejs connections with ultralight and I have a browser based client able to connect, complete the handshake, and send/receive `TALKREQ`/`TALKRESP` messages with ultralight

author: acolytec3
content: It's still very hacky at this point but my next step will be to extend the `discv5` implementation further to allow ultralight to run both a UDP socket and maintain connections with browser based clients

author: acolytec3
content: which should enable the PoC UDP proxy for browser clients we discussed yesterday
